# Preface
In this note, I would like to perform some EDA on cryptocurrencies, hope that I can get some insight from it.
* Import needed packages
* Load data for further analysis
* Convert timestamp to date format
* EDA with "seaborn" package
* EDA with "plotly" package
* Market Size of Cryptocurrencies
